newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Silicon Valley Research.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Silicon Valley Research.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said analyst Doug van Dorsten cut his rating on Silicon Valley Research Inc to hold from buy after "disappointing" earnings for the second quarter ended September 30.
-- The company reported a net loss of $0.20 a share versus a profit of $0.01 a share a year ago. Street consensus had been for a profit of $0.04 a share, according to van Dorsten.
-- In a statement, Dorsten said he believes sales growth will be modest while the company's backlog increases.
-- He cut his fiscal 1997 estimate to a loss of $0.09 a share from a profit of $0.20 and fiscal 1998 to a profit of $0.32 per share from a profit $0.40.
